title: Bitcoin Smashes $111K Record as U.S.-China Trade Deal Fuels Crypto Bull Run
description: Bitcoin has broken through the barrier of 111,000 today, October 28, 2025, and it is due to the revived optimism about the trade negotiations between the U.S. and China and a breakthrough in institutional buying.
